alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns County through 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near World Golf Village, or 8 miles west of Saint Augustine. This storm was drifting south around 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central St. Johns County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
